materials.name: Instructor Contact Information
materials.description:
Professor: Tedd Wong
E-mail: twong76@mtsac.edu (preferred)
Office Phone: 909-274-4425
Office Location: 61-2505
Office Hours: 6:30 pm MW before class and 8:25 MW after class

materials.name: Course Expectations
materials.description: Access Canvas daily. Attend and participate. Take notes and read materials. Complete all assignments on time. Collaborate with other students and come to office hours. Complete work neatly. Master the material.

materials.name: Grading Scale
materials.description:
Homework: 10%
Midterm 1: 15%
Midterm 2: 15%
Midterm 3: 15%
Project: 20%
Final: 25%
---
A: 90-100%
B: 80-89%
C: 70-79%
D: 60-69%
F: 59 <
